summary:
This mod enables you to equip/un-equip [u]any shield[/u] automatically when your weapon is drawn/sheathed.

*I have also included two 'optional' files for custom off-hand shield daggers.
- Vicious Shield Dagger
- For the Brotherhood Shield Dagger
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/hXQSy.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=4][center](Category 120 - UI - Timesavers)[/center][/size]
[line][size=3][b]Description[/b][/size]

- This mod enables you to equip/un-equip [u]any shield[/u] automatically when your weapon is drawn/sheathed.

[list]I have also included two custom shield daggers as optional files.[*]Vicious Shield Dagger[/*]
[*]For the Brotherhood Shield Dagger[/*]
[/list]

[color=ORANGE][b]SEE IT IN ACTION...[/b][/color]

[center]AUTO UNEQUIP MODS (ARROWS, SHIELDS, & HELMETS)

[youtube]QUZyx8Ewkpw[/youtube]

Video by: Insane0hflex[/center]

[line][size=3][b]Compatibility[/b][/size]
[list] [*]Compatible with all custom weapon/armor mods.[/*]
[/list]
[line][size=3][b]Details[/b][/size]

- Includes custom script for auto equip/un-equip of any shield (Script created by Mitchalek, Modified by Hobbs).

[list][*]Shield will automatically equip when weapon is drawn.[/*]
[*]Shield will automatically un-equip when weapon is sheathed[/*]
[*]Shield will automatically equip when switched from Bow to Primary weapon.[/*]
[*]Shield will need to be manually equipped after 'Fists' or 'Spells' are equipped in the left hand.
[/*][/list]
- Includes 2 custom shield daggers.

[list][*]Daggers can be crafted at the forge with the appropriate crafting perks.[/*]
[*]Vicious Shield Dagger (Requires Dwarven crafting skill).[/*]
[*]For the Brotherhood Shield Dagger (Requires Steel crafting skill).[/*]
[*]Includes both Heavy & Light Shield Dagger variants.[/*]
[/list]
[line][size=3][b]Updates[/b][/size]


[b]1.3[/b]
[list][*]Added new alternate version of Vicious Dagger.[/*]
[*]Added additional fast/faster equip files.
[/*][/list]
[b]1.2[/b]
[list][*]Added a slight equip delay to allow your weapon to be fully drawn before shield is equipped. Bug would sometimes cause your weapon to be drawn twice.[/*][/*]
[/list]
[b]1.1[/b]
[list][*]Improved script run conditions to stay active longer. This will help not having to re-initialize the script again when switching from left hand items (spells, staffs, weapons, fists, torches, ect.) back to your shield.[/*][/*]
[/list]
[b]1.0[/b]
[list][*]Initial release.[/*][/*]
[/list]
[line][size=3][b]Permissions[/b][/size]

[list][*]This mod is based off Mitchalek's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13298]AUTO UNEQUIP HELMET[/url] mod, with permission from the author.
[*]I have used Alek's AUHPlayerScript.pex file and modified it to work with shields.
[*]Vicious Dagger used with permission from author. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6383]HYBRID'S VICIOUS WEAPON PACK[/url]
[*]Nicoroshi's For the Brotherhood Dagger used with permission from author. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16162/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D16162]FOR THE BROTHERHOOD DAGGERS[/url]
[/list]Special thanks to MitchAlek, Mystihybrid/Gabriel Gullbergh, and my buddy Nico for sharing their excellent work. This is a great community to be apart of and I really appreciate all of the help I have received (both here and on the Bethesda forums), since I began modding years ago for Oblivion. Thanks again everyone.[line][size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size]
1. Use NMM installer.
2. Install manually by adding AutoUnequipShileds.esp to your Skyrim/Data folder & UnequipShieldScript.pex to your Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder.

[line][size=3][b]Uninstall[/b][/size]

1. Type [color=ORANGE]'stopquest AUS'[/color] in console.
2. Remove AutoUnequipShileds.esp from Skyrim/Data folder.
3. Remove UnequipShieldScript.pex from Skyrim/Data/Scripts folder.
